param.para: Receives a pointer to the interface of the new presentation descriptor. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This method performs a shallow copy of the presentation descriptor. The stream descriptors are not cloned. Therefore, use caution when modifying the presentation presentation descriptor or its stream descriptors.
